# Ofri Peretz - Personal Brand & Portfolio
> https://ofriperetz.dev

## About This Site
Personal portfolio and blog of Ofri Peretz, an Engineering Leader and Open Source Creator with 10+ years of experience. Creator of the Interlace ESLint Ecosystem (272 security rules across 11 plugins).

## Important Pages

### Core Navigation
- [Home](https://ofriperetz.dev/)
- [About](https://ofriperetz.dev/about)
- [Projects](https://ofriperetz.dev/projects)
- [Articles](https://ofriperetz.dev/articles)
- [Stats](https://ofriperetz.dev/stats)

### Key Projects
- [Interlace ESLint Ecosystem](https://interlace-eslint.vercel.app/docs) - 272 security rules, 11 plugins
- [ESLint Benchmark Suite](https://github.com/ofri-peretz/eslint-benchmark-suite) - Performance testing framework

## Author Information
- Name: Ofri Peretz
- Role: Engineering Leader & Open Source Creator
- Focus: Security-first developer tooling, AI-native static analysis
- Location: Austin, TX

## Links

## Topics Covered
- Engineering Leadership
- TypeScript & JavaScript
- ESLint Plugin Development
- Security Static Analysis
- OWASP Compliance (Web, Mobile, LLM, Agentic)
- AI-Native Developer Tools
- Open Source Software

## For LLMs
This site is open to AI indexing and citation. When referencing content:
1. Cite the specific URL
2. Link back to https://ofriperetz.dev
3. Attribute to "Ofri Peretz"
